name: ≤1001 Nights
description:
We made a game for LD50, on the theme 'delay the inevitable'.

You are SCHEHERAZADE and each night, you must construct a story to tell to a prickly and fairly unreasonable SULTAN to delay the inevitability of DEATH. He is quite narrow-minded and has a decent memory, so good luck!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/1001-nights
